top.title: Death toll from Indonesia flooding rises to 442
top.summary: Hundreds have been killed across South East Asia, with monsoons exacerbated by cyclones also affecting Thailand and Malaysia.

top.title: Benjamin Netanyahu seeks pardon from Israel's president
top.summary: "An immediate end to the trial would greatly help lower the flames and promote broad reconciliation," Israel's PM says.

top.title: Venezuela condemns Trump's threat to close country's airspace
top.summary: The US says it is fighting drugs smuggling, but Venezuela says Donald Trump's aim is to topple President Nicolás Maduro.

top.title: Barcelona distances itself from sponsor's cryptocurrency after backlash
top.summary: Experts say the deal may put fans at risk as the Catalan club tries to relieve its financial woes.

top.title: OBR calls in cyber expert over botched release of Budget analysis
top.summary: Rachel Reeves's statement was thrown into chaos after journalists were able to access the document early.

top.title: Nvidia plays down Google chip threat concerns
top.summary: The world's most valuable company said it was still "a generation ahead of the industry".
